text: This is a very sweet and cheerful looking cafe and ice cream shop. The staff here is absolutely lovely. She was very friendly and smiley, makes you feel very welcome and happy to support this business. They have a small menu of sweet treats but all very nice. They use Farm Fresh fresh milk, but they also have vegan options without cows milk. There is also a retail section at the back selling Farm Fresh products. I ordered a kurma milk with brown sugar boba and it was delicious. Happy to come back again to try other drinks and ice cream or yogurts.
You can eat and relax by enjoying the ice cream and drinks sold there.

Very friendly staffs.
Ice cream is so smooth, not too sweet, will not be guilty after ate. The milktea is really using Farmfresh milk, so rich and healthy.
Very good service by the Malay young man. The best outlet in jb. Other outlets give so much ice and so little boba but this outlet really giving less ice and much more boba. Good and the best!
Will come back some other time to support their business üí™üèª (it's located too far from my home üòâ)
